lead_paragraph: Manager Slaven Bilic has told his West Ham United team to keep on winning as they attempt to notch a fourth straight Premier League victory at struggling champions Leicester City on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Bilic Wants West Ham to Stick to Winning Ways
headline.main: Bilic Wants West Ham to Stick to Winning Ways

snippet: Manager Slaven Bilic has told his West Ham United team to keep on winning as they attempt to notch a fourth straight Premier League victory at struggling champions Leicester City on Saturday....
